1: <sup>1</sup> I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.
2: <sup>2</sup> Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
3: <sup>3</sup> Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
4: <sup>4</sup> Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
5: <sup>5</sup> For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
6: <sup>6</sup> Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
7: <sup>7</sup> Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
8: <sup>8</sup> For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
9: <sup>9</sup> Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
